author: Luke Kawa, Luke Kawa
title: Coronavirus: Amazon workers to strike at New York site over virus concerns
description: 'People need to be held accountable, even [Amazon owner] Jeff Bezos himself,' Amazon worker and leader of strike says
content:
About 100 Amazon employees at a New York fulfilment centre plan to go on strike at noon Monday, saying management has been unresponsive to safety concerns and the spread of the coronavirus at the facility.
Employees are demanding that the Staten Island site … [+2067 chars]
